question: Which of the following has been invaluable in fixing the time of the Indus civilization?
option1: Indus seals discovered in Indus cities
option2: Indus seals discovered in Mesopotamian cities
option3: Mesopotamian pottery discovered in Indus cities
option4: Harappan pottery discovered in Indus cities
answer: Indus seals discovered in Mesopotamian cities
explanation: Indus seals discovered in Mesopotamian cities has been invaluable in fixing the time of the Indus civilization.
